name: aquarium visit
description:
Take a virtual visit to the aquarium - spot some fishes, and enjoy the ambience. 

'aquarium visit' is an interactive simulation born from a nostalgia for aquarium visits. 

-

INSTRUCTIONS:

press [Q] [E] to turn left and right respectively. 
press [SPACE] when icon with an eye pops up to look closer.

-

CREDITS:

Art, Animation and Interactive Design by Hua Chai.

Music by AShamaluevMusic.
